explains: adj. （测试、系统或程序）严密的，缜密的；（规则，制度等）严格的，苛刻的；一丝不苟的；严酷的，恶劣的

sentences.en: The work failed to meet their rigorous standards.
sentences.cn: 工作没有达到他们的严格标准。

sentences.en: Was it a curriculum that appeared more rigorous, perhaps?
sentences.cn: 或许，它是一门看起来更严格的课程？

sentences.en: All vitamin supplements would be evaluated in scientifically rigorous clinical trials.
sentences.cn: 所有维生素补充剂都会经过科学严格的临床试验评估。
